>>> 
Gents, 
>» 
>>> The following is a brief update as it relates to the Epstein Autopsy. 
>» 
>» 
>>> Ligature marks around the neck, petechia hemorrhage in the eyes, fractured hyoid bone-All the injuries 
noted are consistent with the circumstances surrounding the death. 
>>> Deep tissue bleeding to left shoulder/scapula area, which is believed to be caused from the position he hung 
himself. 
>>> Dr. Roman would not provide a Cause & Manner of Death at this time and will be pending this case for 
additional studies (histology, neuropathology, toxicology) 
>» 
>» 
>>> In addition, the family hired private pathologist, Dr. Baden Michael, who was present for the autopsy. We 
will continue to track this case and advise of any new or significant developments. 
>» 
>» 
>» 
Lieutenant 
>>> Commanding Officer
